alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Macon; Marion; Peach; Talbot; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Macon, northern Marion, west central Peach, southwestern Crawford, southern Talbot and Taylor Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 407 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Juniper to near Butler to near Hicks, and moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Butler, Talbotton, Reynolds, Junction City, Geneva, Nakomis, Juniper, Baldwinville, Garden Valley, Oakland, Hicks, Olive Branch, Po Biddy Crossroads, Potterville, Mauk, Howard, Marion Estates, Prattsburg, Carsonville and Wesley Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Macon; Marion; Peach; Talbot; Taylor
